entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required LDAP extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Uw PHP configuratie mist waarschijnlijk de benodigde LDAP extensie. Zie http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php voor installatie hulp.

entry.string: LDAP Error: Connection to server #(1) port_number #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDAP Fout: Verbinding met server #(1) poort nummer #(2) mislukt

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to set LDAP Protocol version to 3
entry.translation: LDAP Fout: Het instellen van LDAP protocol versie 3 is mislukt

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to start TLS
entry.translation: LDAP Fout: TLS kon niet gestart worden

entry.string: LDAP Error: Search LDAP base_dn #(1) filter #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDAP Fout: Zoeken in LDAP base_dn #(1) en filter #(2) mislukt
